channel.title: iOS 11 on Accessibility -> Up to 11!
channel.description: Recent content in iOS 11 on Accessibility -> Up to 11!

item.title: Improving your App’s Accessibility with iOS 11
item.description: Note: This article was originally published in Medium Apple introduced iOS 11 at their World Wide Developer Conference (WWDC) in June 2017. WWDC is Apple’s showcase of new tools and developer APIs covering iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. In this post we’d like to show you what’s new in accessibility in iOS 11, and how you can incorporate these features to make your app more accessible to your users. If it is your first time reading about Accessibility in iOS, Apple has a pretty good definition for app accessibility:
